articles.author: Lili Bayer
articles.title: Hungarian PM Orbán set for fourth straight term with big election win - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Populist leader who has cultivated ties to Putin cast himself as guardian of stability amid war in Ukraine.
articles.content:
BUDAPEST Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orbán scored a crushing victory in a parliamentary election on Sunday, securing a fourth consecutive term for the populist Kremlin-friendly leader.
